Title: The Post-Modern Prometheus
Plot: Filmed in glorious black and white with a comic book feel to it, this is a modern retelling of Frankenstein as Mulder and Scully get caught up in a town where the residents live on Jerry Springer episodes and fear a two-faced monster who has been impregnating the women.
GuestStars: John O'Hurley, Pattie Tierce, Stewart Gale, Chris Giacoletti, Chris Owens, Miriam Smith, Vitaliy Kravchenko, Jerry Springer, Lloyd Berry, Xantha Radley, Jean-Yves Hammel, Jonathan Palis, Dana Grahame, C. Ernst Har
